page.title: 09VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Both Combeinteignhead and Stokeinteignhead have village halls which are regularly used. Stokeinteignhead once had a Drama Group but that has recently disbanded. The Primary school puts on plays and concerts, especially at Christmas, in Stokeinteignhead village hall. Various organisations get together to present concerts and comic shows from time to time, particularly to raise funds for themselves or to pay for the upkeep of the halls. The youth club organizes discos. The nearest regular professional theatre is in Exeter, or occasionally at Torquay, while there are cinemas and discos in Torquay and Newton Abbot. Some local people belong to amateur operatic or dramatic groups in the nearby towns.
